about.title: About JSS Polytechnic
about.subtitle: Learn about our mission, history, and commitment to inclusive technical education

mission.title: Our Mission & Purpose
mission.description1: JSS Polytechnic for the Differently Abled is committed to providing accessible, quality technical education that empowers students with disabilities to achieve their full potential.
mission.description2: Our institution focuses on creating an inclusive learning environment where students can acquire skills, knowledge, and confidence needed to excel in the technical fields of their choice.
mission.imageAlt: Students learning in an accessible classroom environment

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description1: We envision a society where differently-abled individuals have equal opportunities in education and employment, contributing their unique perspectives and talents to the technical workforce.
vision.description2: Our goal is to be a center of excellence in technical education that bridges the gap between differently-abled students and employment opportunities in the industry.
vision.imageAlt: Group of diverse students collaborating on a project

history.title: Our History & Journey
history.subtitle: For over two decades, JSS Polytechnic has been pioneering accessible technical education

founding.title: Institution Founded
founding.description: JSS Polytechnic for the Differently Abled was established as the first specialized technical institution for differently-abled students in the region.

expansion.title: Campus Expansion
expansion.description: Expanded our facilities with new accessible laboratories, classrooms, and assistive technology resources to accommodate more students.

recognition.title: National Recognition
recognition.description: Received national recognition for excellence in accessible education and achievement in student placement outcomes.

today.title: Present Day
today.description: Today, JSS Polytechnic stands as a premier institution with state-of-the-art facilities serving hundreds of differently-abled students annually.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our institution and programs

1.question: What types of disabilities do you accommodate?
1.answer: Our institution is designed to accommodate students with various disabilities including visual impairment, hearing impairment, mobility challenges, and learning disabilities. Our facilities and teaching methodologies are adapted to meet different needs.

2.question: Do you provide hostel facilities?
2.answer: Yes, we provide separate hostel facilities for male and female students with accessible rooms, common areas, and 24/7 support staff to assist students with their needs.

3.question: What assistive technologies are available?
3.answer: We offer a wide range of assistive technologies including screen readers, magnifiers, speech-to-text software, specialized keyboards, adaptive workstations, and sign language interpretation services.

4.question: How do you help with job placements?
4.answer: Our dedicated placement cell works with industry partners to create employment opportunities for our graduates. We provide career counseling, interview preparation, and job-specific skill development.

5.question: Are scholarships available for students?
5.answer: Yes, we offer various scholarships and financial aid options. These include government scholarships, institutional merit scholarships, and need-based financial assistance programs.
